item.description:
Well folks, unfortunately I have to again postpone the holiday party as one of the band members needs to travel for his "day" job. Hard to believe these gentlemen have real jobs, did you know one of them is actually a dentist by day?? True! And all nice folks.
So...please watch for a new date, just waiting to hear back from the hall manager. This is as tricky as planning a wedding. But, when it happens it should be alot of fun.
In the meantime...we are meeting at Backstage Grille in Tewksbury. The management there was very accomodating last time and even reserved a special area just for us. Jill and Karen are planning the event and we all hope you can join us. A new band called "Scortch" will be providing the dance music and their play list sounds great.

Please let us know in your response if you would like to meet earlier at 8 for dinner. They claim to have great sirloin tips! Hope to see you there.
:-)
item.name: PARTY ALTERNATIVE...
